messages: 1. You're a wild west cowpoke! Saunter into the saloon! (Or just saunter around.)
2. Find another cowpoke and prepare yourselves for a duel. (Put your hand on your hip over an imaginary holster.)
3. Count to three together out loud, and on three, 'draw', and 'shoot' the other person a compliment.
5. Say what you would like most about being a cowpoke.
